abstract: 50 Cent| Questions for Facebook Investors| Job Cuts Seen at Barclays Capital| Meredith Whitney Sticks to Her Guns
snippet: 50 Cent| Questions for Facebook Investors| Job Cuts Seen at Barclays Capital| Meredith Whitney Sticks to Her Guns
lead_paragraph: Pumping Stocks Jesse Eisinger asks: “Is what 50 Cent did really that different from what happens all day long on CNBC when professional money managers take to the airwaves to praise the stocks of companies they already own?”Pro Publica
